suggestion: Specify your contribution and impact, e.g., 'assisted in auditing 15 client accounts, identifying £50k in discrepancies'.
Demonstrate proficiency with examples, e.g., 'used Python to analyze datasets of 10k+ entries, reducing processing time by 40%'.
Quantify experience and outcomes, e.g., 'gained exposure to BIM tools by modeling 5 building structures, ensuring compliance with BS standards'.
Provide evidence of collaboration, e.g., 'collaborated with 8 engineers on bridge design, delivering project 2 weeks early'.
Show passion through achievements, e.g., 'developed ML model for predictive maintenance, improving uptime by 25%'.
Use specific examples, e.g., 'adapted marketing strategy to increase engagement by 30% during campaign pivot'.
Detail your role and results, e.g., 'led site surveys for 3 projects, ensuring 100% compliance with safety standards'.
Quantify assistance, e.g., 'helped develop API endpoints using Node.js, handling 1k requests per minute'.
Build on it with specifics, e.g., 'applied basic cybersecurity principles to secure network with firewalls, preventing breaches'.
Use professional terms, e.g., 'expert in Python scripting for data automation, processing 500GB datasets daily'.
Highlight skills quantitatively, e.g., 'developed full-stack app with React and AWS, serving 10k users'.
Demonstrate initiative, e.g., 'initiated SEO audit, increasing organic traffic by 45%'.
Highlight your input and metrics, e.g., 'participated in tax filings for 20 clients, ensuring zero penalties'.
